page.title: 17A Week in the News
page.content: Here are some examples of incidents repoerted in the local paper,{The {Evening Telegraph,}regarding the survey block in the week May 20th to May 25th. At Desborough Loatlands School a new tradition was started when last year's carnival queen was invited to crown the new monarch. Firemen from three stations were called to a blaze at a chip shop in Desborough on Saturday morning. Two sets of breathing equipment were used in tackling the fire at Veever's chip shop in the High Street and the firemen were called from Desborough, Roithwell and Kettering. Over 50 people attended a meeting of Desborough and Rothwell photographic society to see the fifth{Rushden}Open Colour Slide Exhibition.
